entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
